timeline.bodyText: @victornoel I suggest switching from Can't to Must. In this case, "Must copy bytes to path" would be better.
timeline.author: marceloamadeu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -51,12 +52,15 @@ public void copiesFromByteArrayToPath() throws Exception {
         final String message =
             "Hello, товарищ path äÄ üÜ öÖ and ß";
         final File output = this.folder.newFile();
-        new Assertion<>(
-            "Can't copy bytes to path",
+        new LengthOf(
             new TeeInput(
                 message.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8),
                 output.toPath()
-            ),
+            )
+        ).intValue();
+        new Assertion<>(
+            "Can't copy bytes to path",

timeline.author: marceloamadeu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,12 +70,15 @@ public void copiesFromByteArrayToFile() throws Exception {
         final String message =
             "Hello, товарищ file äÄ üÜ öÖ and ß";
         final File output = this.folder.newFile();
-        new Assertion<>(
-            "Can't copy bytes to file",
+        new LengthOf(
             new TeeInput(
                 message.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8),
                 output
-            ),
+            )
+        ).intValue();
+        new Assertion<>(
+            "Can't copy bytes to file",

timeline.author: marceloamadeu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -81,12 +88,15 @@ public void copiesFromByteArrayToOutput() throws Exception {
         final String message =
             "Hello, товарищ output äÄ üÜ öÖ and ß";
         final File output = this.folder.newFile();
-        new Assertion<>(
-            "Can't copy bytes to output",
+        new LengthOf(
             new TeeInput(
                 message.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8),
                 new OutputTo(output)
-            ),
+            )
+        ).intValue();
+        new Assertion<>(
+            "Can't copy bytes to output",

timeline.message: (#1392) - Reword assertion messages as per REV request
